mapper.insert: insert into found (title, img, pub_date, content, place, phone, state, stick, lostfoundtype_id, user_id) VALUES (#{found.title}, #{found.img}, #{found.pub_date}, #{found.content}, #{found.place}, #{found.phone}, #{found.state}, #{found.stick}, #{found.lostfoundtype_id}, #{found.user_id})
mapper.update: update found set state=#{state} where id=#{id}
update found set phone=#{phone} where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select id, title, img, pub_date, content, place, phone, state, stick, user_id from found where lostfoundtype_id = #{lostfoundtypeId} and state = '未认领' order by pub_date desc
select id, title, img, pub_date, content, place, phone, state, stick, user_id from found where user_id = #{user_id} order by pub_date desc
select id, title, img, pub_date, content, place, phone, state, stick, user_id, lostfoundtype_id from found where stick = #{stick} and state = '未认领'
